Author: henning
Content:
Since you like to judge things without giving a fair chance, there's not much anyone can do for you.

Have you ever used a language in the ML family or one influenced by ML? OCaml, Haskell, Scala, Standard ML, etc? Have you ever used a language with type inference?

If you want performance and you don't want to sacrifice garbage collection, at the moment ML-family languages are the best thing around.

Author: nickb
Title: 10 web application security tips you should already know
